entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Clarenville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:31 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terra Nova National Park 06:30 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Temperature: -11.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -12.2°C
Wind: WNW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. Temperature falling to minus 13 this afternoon except minus 9 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning except mainly cloudy along parts of the coast. Blowing snow along exposed areas of the coast this morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast this morning. Temperature falling to minus 13 this afternoon except minus 9 along parts of the coast. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16 except temperature steady near minus 10 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 16 except temperature steady near minus 10 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023
